The camera used to detect AprilTags perfectly with little tuning, but now, no matter the settings, it’s always extraordinarily jittery. Already tried cleaning the lens with a microfiber cloth which barely seemed to help. Any pointers?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAlso, interestingly, an AR0144 camera that was recently mounted (more recently so than the OV9281) works perfectly despite technically being “slightly” worse.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eEDIT: The OV camera also works well at close distances (within the community) but we need it to work farther away as well.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2023-02-22T23:19:41.814Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":44,"reads":93,"readers_count":92,"score":238.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":427775,"topic_slug":"photonvision-w-apriltags-camera-used-to-work-well-but-no-longer-does","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50684,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6032 | QDash"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-w-apriltags-camera-used-to-work-well-but-no-longer-does/427775/1","custom_user_title":"6032 | QDash","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3150875,"name":"Owen Busler","username":"Owen_Busler","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/owen_busler/{size}/7684_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-22T23:21:55.247Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eIm pretty sure the OV9281 has a manual focus?
